attributes.action: Look into Pensioners that are having to work and pay Council Tax,live in a flat and also have to pay approx.£80 per month maintenance surely it should be 1 or the other, this is very unfair.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The maintenance companies do nothing for their money ,therefore they should be investigated more by the government  to make sure they are carrying out their repairs,decorating etc.Our estate is in a nice area but becoming run down because of the lack of repairs.We have also had pigeons here for the last 3 years soiling everywhere and still they do nothing.
